title: Currency Converter
tagline: A cheaper, {faster} way to send money abroad
desc: Convert any currency—minimal, instant, always updated.
networkError: Network or server error while loading currencies.
moversDesc: Top-moving currency pairs (mock data). Click a card to prefill the converter.
feeDesc: Add a flat fee and/or a percentage fee to see how much you actually receive after fees.
feeResult: Run a conversion first, then add your bank or platform fees to simulate the net amount.
scenarioHeader: Scenario planner will appear when a valid live rate is available.
favoritesDesc: Pin your most-used pairs for one-click access.
alertDesc: Set a target rate for the selected pair. When the live rate crosses your target, a banner will highlight it.
tripDesc: Plan a trip by converting your total budget into the destination currency and seeing a suggested daily budget.
noAlertSet: No alert set for this pair.
